colti:
Technical operations projects series ; no.
            TO 623

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan would finance the
            foreign currency cost of: (a) the construction of the 40 MW
            Rio Lindo Hydroelectric Scheme; (b) the expansion of
            EMEE's transmission system; and (c) feasibility studies
            of future development of hydroelectric power in western Honduras.
